txt.en: You have become a proficient Journeyman Scholar! You may now use Expert Scholar recipes, or continue to work towards Journeyman Scholar mastery.\n\nAdditionally, you are now eligible to join the <rgb=#00FF00>Scholar's Guild</rgb>, a special reputation faction open only to Expert Scholars. To join the Scholar's Guild, seek out a Master or Mistress of Crafting Guilds.
